meanings.definition: To say or do something again.
meanings.sent1: I will repeat the song for you.
meanings.sent2: She likes to repeat her favorite stories.
meanings.sent3: The parrot can repeat what you say.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to repeat in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The echo made her words repeat endlessly.

meanings.sent1: The pattern will repeat every hour.
meanings.sent3: The magic trick will repeat itself automatically.
meanings.sent4: The melody seemed to repeat in his mind all day.
meanings.sent5: The cycle of seasons repeat year after year.

meanings.definition: A broadcast or performance that is repeated.
meanings.sent1: The TV channel will air a repeat of the show.
meanings.sent2: The audience enjoyed the repeat of the concert.
meanings.sent3: The repeat of the play was even better than the first.
meanings.sent4: The repeat of the speech was met with applause.
meanings.sent5: The radio station played a repeat of the interview.
